DROP VIEW IF EXISTS aodn_nsw_oeh_bathy_map ;
CREATE VIEW aodn_nsw_oeh_bathy_map AS WITH files AS ( SELECT *, substring(url, '/NSWOEH_[[:digit:]]+_([[:alnum:]]+)_[^/]+$') AS location, substring(url, '/NSWOEH_([[:digit:]]+)_[^/]+$')::date AS survey_date, substring(url, '_(MB)_') AS survey_methods, substring(url, '_(ScientificRigour|SHP|BTY|BKS)') AS file_type FROM indexed_file WHERE NOT deleted ) SELECT f.url, f.location, f.survey_date, f.survey_methods, CASE f.file_type WHEN 'BTY' THEN 'bathymetry' WHEN 'BKS' THEN 'backscatter' WHEN 'SHP' THEN 'coverage shapefile' ELSE f.file_type END AS file_type, m.area, m.areainfo, m.max_res, m.process, to_char(f.survey_date, 'YYYY') as year, to_char(f.survey_date, 'Month') as month, m.comment, m.authority, m.geom FROM files f JOIN survey_metadata m USING (location, survey_date) WHERE f.survey_methods LIKE '%MB%' ORDER BY url ;
